entities.name: nicholas de mimsy-porpington
entities.description: Sir Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington is a ghost who sticks his head out of the wall to greet Harry. He has an extravagantly plumed hat and a dangerously wobbling head.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is a ghost who is also late, in different senses than Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington. He has a peculiar expression on his face when Harry asks him something.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who greets Sir Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington and asks Nearly Headless Nick something.

relationships.description: Sir Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington greets Harry when he sticks his head out of the wall.
Nearly Headless Nick is asked something by Harry, which makes him uncomfortable and causes a peculiar expression on his face.
